alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mineral; Hampshire; Morgan; Western Mineral (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 1:19PM EST until January 25 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of western Maryland and eastern and panhandle West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mineral; Hampshire; Morgan; Western Mineral
